stem: A study is designed to look at the efficacy of a mandible advancement device in reducing snoring. The severity of snoring was assessed in 50 people by their partners using a 10-point scale before and after using the device. What is the most appropriate statistical test to apply to this data?
disc: The Wilcoxon-signed rank test is the most appropriate statistical test here as the study is non-parametric, paired, and from the same sample.
